item.title: The Ting Tings - Great DJ
item.description:
Fed up
with your indigestion
Swallow words
one by one
Folks got high
at a quarter to five
Don’t you feel
your growing up undone
Nothing
but the local DJ
Who said he had
some songs to play
What went down from
his fooling around
Gave hope
and a brand new day
Imagine
all the girls
Ah ah ah ah
ah ah ah ah
And the boys ah ah
ah ah ah ah ah ah
And the strings ee ee
ee ee ee ee ee ee
And the drums
the drums
The drums
the drums
The drums the drums
the drums the drums
The drums the drums
the drums the drums oh

Nothing was
the same again
All about where
and when
Blowing our minds
in our life unkind
Gotta love
the BPM
When his work was
all but done
Remembering
how this begun
We wore his love
like a hand in a glove
Where the future plays
it all night long
And nothing
but the girls
Ah ah ah ah
ah ah ah ah
And the boys ah ah
ah ah ah ah ah ah
And the strings ee ee
ee ee ee ee ee ee
And the drums
the drums
The drums
the drums
The drums the drums
the drums the drums

the drums the drums
The drums the drums
the drums the drums

the drums the drums

all the girls

ah ah ah ah ah oh
